main_definition: Extending or operating throughout the world; global in scope.

meanings_and_examples.example: The company's products are sold worldwide.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Involving or occurring everywhere in the world
meanings_and_examples.example: There is a worldwide effort to combat climate change.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Having an influence, effect, or presence throughout the entire world
meanings_and_examples.example: The pandemic had a worldwide impact on economies and societies.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Including all countries in the world as participants or beneficiaries
meanings_and_examples.example: This scholarship is available to students worldwide.
